meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robert Sale Valerie Braun Greg Seroka Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7059.

td.p: Robert Sale, a government relations liaison from Washington, D.C.
Valerie Braun, a homemaker from Cincinnati, Ohio
Greg Seroka, a chef from Steamboat Springs, Colorado (whose 5-day cash winnings total $133,200)

tr.td: THINGS TO DO ON A RAINY DAY
STARTS & ENDS WITH T
LONG-RUNNING MUSICALS IN SHORT
ADVERTISING ICONS
COUNTRIES BY HOTEL
(Alex: We'll give you the hotel.)
PRESENTED IN 2D
